data.lyric:
[ti:The Bones (Acoustic)]
[ar:Maren Morris]
[al:Maren Morris: Reimagined]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Bones (Acoustic) - Maren Morris
[00:04.74]Lyrics by：Maren Morris/Jimmy Robbins/Laura Veltz
[00:09.49]Composed by：Maren Morris/Jimmy Robbins/Laura Veltz
[00:14.23]We're in the homestretch of the high times
[00:20.10]
[00:20.84]We took a hard left but we're alright
[00:27.57]Yeah life sure can try to put love through it but
[00:35.57]We built this right so nothing's ever gonna move it
[00:41.62]When my bones are good the rest don't matter
[00:45.08]Yeah the paint could peel the glass could shatter
[00:48.68]Let it break 'cause you and I remain the same
[00:55.54]When there ain't a crack in the foundation
[00:59.83]Baby I know when this storm we're facing
[01:02.50]Will go right over while we stay put
[01:06.31]The house don't fall when my bones are good
[01:10.45]
[01:16.29]Call it dumb luck but baby you and I
[01:22.45]
[01:23.01]Can't even mess it up although we both try
[01:29.33]No it don't always go the way we planned it
[01:37.13]But the wolves came and went and we're still standing
[01:43.97]When my bones are good the rest don't matter
[01:47.29]Yeah the paint could peel the glass could shatter
[01:50.80]Let it break 'cause you and I remain the same
[01:57.62]When there ain't a crack in the foundation
[02:01.79]
[02:02.34]Baby I know when this storm we're facing
[02:04.84]Will go right over while we stay put
[02:08.31]The house don't fall when my bones are good
[02:12.39]
[02:16.80]When my bones are good
[02:21.20]
[02:25.66]Bones are good the rest
[02:30.58]Baby it don't really matter
[02:32.79]Paint could peel the glass
[02:36.84]So the glass so the glass could shatter
[02:39.91]Bones are good the rest the rest don't matter
[02:46.60]Paint could peal the glass
[02:50.93]
[02:51.53]The glass could shatter
[02:52.97]When the bones are good the rest don't matter
[02:56.51]Yeah the paint could peel the glass could shatter
[03:00.04]Let it break
[03:02.40]'Cause you and I remain the same
[03:06.85]When there ain't a crack in the foundation
[03:11.04]Baby I know when this storm we're facing
[03:13.75]Will go right over while we stay put
[03:17.36]The house don't fall when the bones are good
[03:23.28]
[03:24.14]Ooh
data.trans:
[ti:The Bones (Acoustic)]
[ar:Maren Morris]
[al:Maren Morris: Reimagined]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.74]//
[00:09.48]//
[00:14.23]我们的苦日子就要到头了
[00:20.10]
[00:20.84]我们做出了艰难的选择 但我们一定会携手走到最后
[00:27.57]的确 生活可能让爱情经受磨难 但是
[00:35.57]我们的爱坚固无比 不因任何事物动摇
[00:41.62]只要房屋框架坚固 其他都无所谓
[00:45.08]墙面可能剥落 窗户可能破碎
[00:48.68]任凭风吹雨打 我们至死不渝
[00:55.54]只要地基牢固 没有裂缝
[00:59.83]宝贝 我知道 不管遇到多大的风暴
[01:02.50]只要我们坚定不移 就绝不会被打倒
[01:06.31]只要框架坚固 房屋就不会倒塌
[01:10.45]
[01:16.29]姑且说我们是傻人有傻福吧 但是宝贝 你和我
[01:22.45]
[01:23.01]虽然遇到过挫折 但绝不会被打败
[01:29.33]的确 生活不可能事事如意
[01:37.13]但那些磨难终将过去 我们依然昂然伫立
[01:43.97]只要房屋框架坚固 其他都无所谓
[01:47.29]墙面可能剥落 窗户可能破碎
[01:50.80]任凭风吹雨打 我们至死不渝
[01:57.62]只要地基牢固 没有裂缝
[02:01.79]
[02:02.34]宝贝 我知道 不管遇到多大的风暴
[02:04.84]只要我们坚定不移 就绝不会被打倒
[02:08.31]只要框架坚固 房屋就不会倒塌
[02:12.39]
[02:16.80]只要框架坚固
[02:21.20]
[02:25.66]框架坚固 
[02:30.58]宝贝 其他都无所谓
[02:32.79]墙面可能剥落 窗户可能破碎
[02:36.84]窗户可能破碎
[02:39.91]框架坚固 其他都无所谓
[02:46.60]墙面可能剥落 窗户可能破碎
[02:50.93]
[02:51.53]窗户可能破碎
[02:52.97]只要房屋框架坚固 其他都无所谓
[02:56.51]墙面可能剥落 窗户可能破碎
[03:00.04]任凭风吹雨打
[03:02.40]我们至死不渝
[03:06.85]只要地基牢固 没有裂缝
[03:11.04]宝贝 我知道 不管遇到多大的风暴
[03:13.75]只要我们坚定不移 就绝不会被打倒
[03:17.36]只要框架坚固 房屋就不会倒塌
[03:23.28]
[03:24.14]//
